rows.label: qst710902_msg0001
rows.name:
OK... You're even stronger than you
look! Such incredible power...

rows.label: qst710902_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm the best sniper in the Imperial
Army, but you made light work of
me. You've shown us all up.

rows.label: qst710902_msg0003
rows.name:
It's not just your physical
strength, either.

rows.label: qst710902_msg0004
rows.name:
It's the way that you fight
as Driver and Blade... That
incredible synergy!

rows.label: qst710902_msg0005
rows.name:
I get the feeling your true
strength lies in the
connection that you have.

rows.label: qst710902_msg0006
rows.name:
You've shown me the way! From now on,
I won't see myself as a lone wolf
anymore, but as part of a larger whole!

rows.label: qst710902_msg0007
rows.name:
I'll think of my friends, and
all the Superbian people...and
all the future generations...

rows.label: qst710902_msg0008
rows.name:
I'll make my goal in life to
be someone who is loved and
respected by my people.

rows.label: qst710902_msg0009
rows.name:
This battle has taught me
what I really ought to be
aiming for in life.

rows.label: qst710902_msg0010
rows.name: I hardly have the words to thank you...
